√sagh 'be equal to'

present: [5.] ásaghnos  

[perfect: sasāgha  ]

aorist: [1.] sághat  saghyāsam   -- [3.] asīṣaghat   -- [5.] asaghīt  asāghīt  

[future: saghiṣyati  saghitā  sāsagh-  sisaghiṣa-  sāghaya-  ]

derivatives: sághan  

Doubtless another form of √sah.
